SEARCH
Package com.fortisbank.data.interfaces

Interface ITransactionRepository

All Known Implementing Classes:
TransactionRepository, TransactionRepositoryFile
public interface ITransactionRepository
Interface for transaction repository operations. Provides methods to manage transaction data.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description

  • Method Details

    • getTransactionByNumber

      Transaction getTransactionByNumber(String transactionNumber) throws TransactionRepositoryException
      Retrieves a transaction by its number.
      Parameters:
      transactionNumber - the number of the transaction to retrieve
      Returns:
      the transaction with the specified number, or null if not found
      Throws:
      TransactionRepositoryException

    • getTransactionsByAccount

      TransactionList getTransactionsByAccount(String accountId) throws TransactionRepositoryException
      Retrieves all transactions associated with a specific account ID.
      Parameters:
      accountId - the ID of the account whose transactions to retrieve
      Returns:
      a list of transactions associated with the specified account ID
      Throws:
      TransactionRepositoryException

    • getAllTransactions

      TransactionList getAllTransactions() throws TransactionRepositoryException
      Retrieves all transactions.
      Returns:
      a list of all transactions
      Throws:
      TransactionRepositoryException

    • insertTransaction

      void insertTransaction(Transaction transaction) throws TransactionRepositoryException
      Inserts a new transaction.
      Parameters:
      transaction - the transaction to insert
      Throws:
      TransactionRepositoryException

    • deleteTransaction

      void deleteTransaction(String transactionNumber) throws TransactionRepositoryException
      Deletes a transaction by its number.
      Parameters:
      transactionNumber - the number of the transaction to delete
      Throws:
      TransactionRepositoryException

    • getTransactionsByCustomerAndDateRange

      TransactionList getTransactionsByCustomerAndDateRange(String customerID, LocalDate start, LocalDate end) throws TransactionRepositoryException
      Retrieves transactions for a specific customer within a date range.
      Parameters:
      customerID - the ID of the customer whose transactions to retrieve
      start - the start date of the date range
      end - the end date of the date range
      Returns:
      a list of transactions for the specified customer within the date range
      Throws:
      TransactionRepositoryException

    • getBalanceBeforeDate

      BigDecimal getBalanceBeforeDate(String customerID, LocalDate start) throws TransactionRepositoryException
      Retrieves the balance for a specific customer before a given date.
      Parameters:
      customerID - the ID of the customer whose balance to retrieve
      start - the date before which to calculate the balance
      Returns:
      the balance for the specified customer before the given date
      Throws:
      TransactionRepositoryException
